headline: 5 Off-the-Radar Energy Stocks Outperforming Their Peers
summary: A handful of power-focused names are quietly outperforming.

headline: Utilities Aren’t Just for Safety Anymore. This One Has Strong Growth Prospects.
summary: Thanks to the demand for energy to power artificial-intelligence data centers, the group has become linked to the AI trade, whether it’s nuclear utilities, such as  Constellation Energy  and  Vistra  which have deals with the big hyperscalers to provide energy, or more traditional utilities, including Virginia’s  Dominion Energy  and California’s  PG&E  which supplies power for  Microsoft’s  San Jose data center.  That’s not bad, especially considering the relative safety the stock provides.

headline: What Is One of the Best Energy Stocks to Buy Right Now?
summary: Constellation Energy offers exactly what data centers and artificial intelligence players need: reliable 24/7 power.
